translations: n.材料，佐料，原料；（成功的）要素，因素（ingredient 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Our skin cream contains only natural ingredients.
sentences.translation: 我们的护肤霜只含天然成分。

sentences.sentence: Blend the ingredients until you have a smooth cream.
sentences.translation: 把这些配料调成均匀的糊状。

sentences.sentence: Get all the ingredients together before you start cooking.
sentences.translation: 把所有的材料放在一起再开始烹饪。
